channel.title: [639] RuneEvo! - Lots of Content, 24/7, Unique
channel.description:
Featuring: [size=2em]Rune-Evolution 639[/size] Hosted by King Fox
Website: [url=http://rune-evo.co.uk/]http://rune-evo.co.uk/[/url]
Server is fairly old, but we just moved to a different revision, and so far everything is working out great! We have lots of content, economy is a bit tough along with skilling, but it still remains fun for everyone! We have alot of unique content, such as:
[ul][li]Live Radio broadcast by our own DJ![/li] [li]IRC Chat for better communication[/li] [li]Xenforo Forum Integration[/li] [li]VPS Hosted 24/7 around the clock![/li] [li]Steam Integration![/li] [li]Automated Donate and Vote 4 cash![/li] [li]Custom made Highscores![/li] [li]Our own Item DB to lookup Item Prices![/li] [li]And much more![/li][/ul] With our no-lag dedicated VPS, the fun just never stops! Our staff is here to help and to make your experience as great as possible! We will never ban for PK'ing us in Wildy or abuse any other power that most servers commonly do!
We maintain a well respected community to provide players with an all new experience. We try our hardest to push out updates almost every day for new and exciting content that will surely grab your attention! Join today!

item.title: [639] RuneEvo! - Lots of Content, 24/7, Unique
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

Featuring:
[size=2em]Rune-Evolution 639[/size]
Hosted by King Fox

Website: http://rune-evo.co.uk/

Server is fairly old, but we just moved to a different revision, and so far everything is working out great! We have lots of content, economy is a bit tough along with skilling, but it still remains fun for everyone! We have alot of unique content, such as:

[ul][li]Live Radio broadcast by our own DJ![/li]
[li]IRC Chat for better communication[/li]
[li]Xenforo Forum Integration[/li]
[li]VPS Hosted 24/7 around the clock![/li]
[li]Steam Integration![/li]
[li]Automated Donate and Vote 4 cash![/li]
[li]Custom made Highscores![/li]
[li]Our own Item DB to lookup Item Prices![/li]
[li]And much more![/li][/ul]
With our no-lag dedicated VPS, the fun just never stops! Our staff is here to help and to make your experience as great as possible! We will never ban for PK’ing us in Wildy or abuse any other power that most servers commonly do!

We maintain a well respected community to provide players with an all new experience. We try our hardest to push out updates almost every day for new and exciting content that will surely grab your attention! Join today!
